content.question: All of the following have been cited as reasons for the dropping of atomic bombs on Japan in 1945 EXCEPT the need to

choices.label: block a planned Japanese invasion of the United States
keep the Soviet Union out of the war against Japan
demonstrate American superiority in weaponry to the Soviet Union
force the unconditional surrender of Japan

content.answer: block a planned Japanese invasion of the United States
